exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: simpl. intros x n H. unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo. split. * intros i H1. destruct H1 as [H1 H2]. destruct H1 as [H1 H3]. rewrite H in H1. simpl in H3. lia. * intros e H1. inversion H1.
